chart.title: Total health spending per person
chart.subtitle: The sum of public and private annual health expenditure per person. This data is adjusted for differences in living costs between countries, but it is not adjusted for inflation.
chart.note: This data is expressed in current [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation).

selection: Middle East, North Africa, Afghanistan and Pakistan (WB)
